home.title: This is title for home
home.body: This is the help text for home

network.title: Network
network.body: In this view you can choose a device on your current network to inspect. The figure shows the topology of the current network you're connected to and the table provides more information about individual devices. Hover over the different tabs for more information about them

sniffer.title: Sniffer
sniffer.body: In this view you can inspect the packets of the device you selected in the network view. You should be able to see all HTTP and HTTPS traffic. If the information is encrypted you will see the ðŸ”’ icon in the row, otherwise you should be able to read it's contents. Hover over the different tabs for more information about them
